in that high enough elo, the real pro-y pro's, they know how to counter, how to play defensive enough, thats the point, in gold and below hes op really

good peel, aoe, teamfight sustain, its not his job to engage, he has decent cc tho considering a short wide pull and his big ass slow, his large true damage, from ult, he is a jack of all trades, but with his kit, more of a queen of all trades (yes i know thats not a saying but the point is its a 1 up)
